translations: 独裁的，专政的；专横傲慢的

sentences.sentence: That was partly due to his talents: showmanship, strategic vision, an astonishing attention to detail and a dictatorial management style which many bosses must have envied.
sentences.translation: 这在一定程度上归功于他的天赋：表演技巧、战略眼光、对细节的惊人关注和独断专行的管理风格，许多老板肯定对此羡慕不已。
我不喜欢他那幅专横的态度。
